responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[24F282B6434E981D3FBC5B9E3C7849C5]", "128F97BA4A673867B4E178AC983B003D", "From those ruins, deeper in the heart of the old city, a new type of construct emerges. They\'re larger, plated in what looks like actual gold, and their plates are covered in densely packed runes that pulse with a disturbing light. We\'ve taken to calling them \'The Gilded.\' They\'re not just stronger; they seem to be leading the others, directing their assaults with a chilling sort of intelligence.If we\'re to understand this invasion, and survive it, we need to understand The Gilded.")
name: ANV_FTUE_0007_Commander_GrettaIronhand_9_Response
